I am not confortable with the "width" parameter in
a_is_bigger = tf.sigmoid((a-b) / width)

So I tried to keep your main idea in a different form (there it is 2 hidden layer network using tanh activation to emulate the maximum function).
I am on it right now.

body:
I am not confortable with the "width" parameter in
`a_is_bigger = tf.sigmoid((a-b) / width)`

So I tried to keep your main idea in a different form (there it is 2 hidden layer network using tanh activation to emulate the maximum function).
I am on it right now.
